authentication.name: authentication
authentication.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。 与鉴权相关，注意不要在公共日志中输出敏感信息。

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation
operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

title.name: title
title.description: A succinct description of the nature, symptoms, cause, or effect of the incident
title.ai_hint: A succinct description of the nature, symptoms, cause, or effect of the incident

serviceId.name: serviceId
serviceId.description: The incident will be created on this service. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
serviceId.ai_hint: The incident will be created on this service. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

email.name: email
email.description: The email address of a valid user associated with the account making the request
email.ai_hint: The email address of a valid user associated with the account making the request

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: escalationPolicyId
options.description: Delegate this incident to the specified escalation policy. Cannot be specified if an assignee is given. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: details
options.description: Additional details about the incident which will go in the body

options.name: incidentKey
options.description: Sending subsequent requests referencing the same service and with the same incident_key will result in those requests being rejected if an open incident matches that incident_key

options.name: priorityId
options.description: The incident will be created on this service. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

conferenceBridgeUi.name: conferenceBridgeUi

values.name: conferenceNumber
values.description: Phone numbers should be formatted like +1 415-555-1212,,,,1234#, where a comma (,) represents a one-second wait and pound (#) completes access code input

values.name: conferenceUrl
values.description: An URL for the conference bridge. This could be a link to a web conference or Slack channel.

conferenceBridgeUi.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

options.name: options
isOverview
options.description: Whether to return a subset of log entries that show only the most important changes to the incident

options.name: since
options.description: The start of the date range over which you want to search. (the limit on date ranges is 6 months).

options.name: timeZone
options.description: Time zone in which dates in the result will be rendered. If not set dates will return UTC. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: until
options.description: The end of the date range over which you want to search. (the limit on date ranges is 6 months).

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

updateFields.name: updateFields

options.name: escalationLevel
options.description: Escalate the incident to this level in the escalation policy

options.name: escalationPolicyId
options.description: Delegate this incident to the specified escalation policy. Cannot be specified if an assignee is given. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: priorityId
options.description: The incident will be created on this service. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: resolution
options.description: The resolution for this incident if status is set to resolved

options.name: status
options.description: The new status of the incident

options.name: title
options.description: A succinct description of the nature, symptoms, cause, or effect of the incident

updateFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

logEntryId.name: logEntryId
logEntryId.description: Unique identifier for the log entry
logEntryId.ai_hint: Unique identifier for the log entry

conditional_rules: IF resource == 'incident' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'incident' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'title'
IF resource == 'incident' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'serviceId'
IF resource == 'incident' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'email'
IF resource == 'incident' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'incident' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'conferenceBridgeUi'
IF resource == 'incident' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'incidentId'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'incident' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'incident' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'incident' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'incident' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'incidentId'
IF resource == 'incident' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'email'
IF resource == 'incident' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'incident' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'conferenceBridgeUi'
IF resource == 'incidentNote' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'incidentNote' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'incidentId'
IF resource == 'incidentNote' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'content'
IF resource == 'incidentNote' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'email'
IF resource == 'incidentNote' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'incidentId'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'incidentNote' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'incidentNote' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'logEntry' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'logEntry' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'logEntryId'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'logEntry' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'logEntry' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'logEntry' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'user' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'userId'
